posts.title: HCU Deforestation Protest
posts.description: Students from HCU are standing against massive deforestation in the city outskirts. üå≥‚úä.The University of Hyderabad has been at the center of a major controversy due to the Telangana government's plan to auction 400 acres of forested land near the university campus for IT and infrastructure projects. This land, known as Kancha Gachibowli, is considered ecologically important and known as the 'lungs of Hyderabad'. The government's decision led to widespread protests, with students, environmentalists, and citizens opposing the deforestation

comments.text: Students from HCU are standing against massive deforestation in the city outskirts

posts.title: Moon Mission 2025
posts.description: ISRO is preparing for a lunar mission in 2025! Here's what we know so far. üåïüöÄIndia's Chandrayaan program consists of several successful and ongoing lunar missions. Chandrayaan-1 (2008) mapped the Moon's surface, and Chandrayaan-2 (2019) sent an orbiter that continues to send high-resolution images. Chandrayaan-3 (2023) successfully soft-landed near the Moon's south pole, making India the fourth country to achieve this feat. Future missions like Chandrayaan-4 (2027) aim to collect lunar samples and Chandrayaan-5 is also approved.

comments.text: India's Chandrayaan program consists of several successful and ongoing lunar missions

posts.title: Summer Street Style 2025
posts.description: Flowy shirts, cargo skirts, and sustainable sandals are ruling summer fashion this year. Summer Street Style 2025 is all about embracing comfort without sacrificing style. It's about mixing elevated basics with statement retro pieces and incorporating thoughtful details. In Hyderabad, expect to see these global trends adapted with a focus on staying cool and comfortable in the local climate, potentially blending them with contemporary takes on traditional silhouettes.‚òÄÔ∏èüëï

posts.title: mern stack
posts.description: very huge potential skill to earn more.the MERN stack is a powerful and versatile choice for building modern web applications, especially for developers comfortable with JavaScript. Its benefits in terms of unified development, scalability, and a rich ecosystem make it a popular option for a wide range of projects. posts.title: Markup language
posts.description:
A markup language is a text-encoding system which specifies the structure and formatting of a document and potentially the relationships among its parts.[1] Markup can control the display of a document or enrich its content to facilitate automated processing.

A markup language is a set of rules governing what markup information may be included in a document and how it is combined with the content of the document in a way to facilitate use by humans and computer programs. The idea and terminology evolved from the "marking up" of paper manuscripts (e.g., with revision instructions by editors), traditionally written with a red pen or blue pencil on authors' manuscripts.[2]

Older markup languages, which typically focus on typography and presentation, include Troff, TeX, and LaTeX. Scribe and most modern markup languages, such as XML, identify document components (for example headings, paragraphs, and tables), with the expectation that technology, such as stylesheets, will be used to apply formatting or other processing.[citation needed]

Some markup languages, such as the widely used HTML, have pre-defined presentation semantics, meaning that their specifications prescribe some aspects of how to present the structured data on particular media. HTML, like DocBook, Open eBook, JATS, and many others, is based on the markup metalanguages SGML and XML. That is, SGML and XML allow designers to specify particular schemas, which determine which elements, attributes, and other features are permitted, and where.[3]

A key characteristic of most markup languages is that they allow intermingling markup with document content such as text and pictures. For example, if a few words in a sentence need to be emphasized, or identified as a proper name, defined term, or another special item, the markup may be inserted between the characters of the sentence

comments.text: Markup can control the display of a document or enrich its content to facilitate automated processing.
